overview: There is pain , sadness , desperation and despair but still a very tiny spark of hope in his eyes. The very last but the most important gamble in his life . A phone call She is relaxing at home with a glass of wine . Very much in her element. Then gets a random call from a complete stranger ,to make a life altering choice , someone else's life. HOW DARE HE ?
title: Chilappol Daivam
